title: T019 [US1]: Run fresh clone test
description:
## Task Details

Clone repository to /tmp, verify only main branch exists, tests pass, then clean up.

## Acceptance Criteria

* Fresh clone succeeds
* Only main branch visible
* Tests pass 100%

## User Story

US1: Clean Git History Establishment (Priority: P1)

## Phase

Phase 2: Post-Push Verification

## Related Spec

[spec.md](./spec.md) | [plan.md](./plan.md) | [tasks.md](./tasks.md)

## Commands

```bash
# Clone to temp location
git clone https://github.com/Obsidian-Owl/floe-runtime.git /tmp/floe-test
cd /tmp/floe-test

# Verify only main branch
git branch -r

# Verify tests pass
make test

# Clean up
cd /Users/dmccarthy/Projects/floe-runtime
rm -rf /tmp/floe-test
```

title: T032: Re-enable branch protection on main
description:
## Task Details

Re-enable branch protection on main branch after Epic 1 completion.

## Acceptance Criteria

* Branch protection re-enabled
* All success criteria verified (SC-001 to SC-008)
* Fresh clone tested and passes
* CI pipeline green on main
* Team notified of completion

## Phase

Phase 5: Final Verification & Polish

## Related Spec

[spec.md](./spec.md) | [plan.md](./plan.md) | [tasks.md](./tasks.md)

## Instructions

GitHub Settings → Branches → main → Edit → Enable protection rules:

* Require pull request reviews before merging
* Require status checks to pass before merging
* Include administrators

title: T011 [US1]: Verify tests pass after merge
description:
## Task Details

~~Run full test suite after merge to ensure no regressions.~~

**UPDATED**: Per Epic 2, Phase 2C ([MIGRATION-ROADMAP.md](http://MIGRATION-ROADMAP.md) lines 152-162), all existing tests will be deleted and recreated for plugin architecture. Tests are expected to fail/be incomplete until Epic 2 completion.

**Decision**: Skip test verification for Epic 1. CI/test fixes happen in Epic 2.

## Acceptance Criteria

* ~~Tests must pass 100% after merge~~ DEFERRED to Epic 2
* Document that baseline tag represents pre-refactor state

## User Story

US1: Clean Git History Establishment (Priority: P1)

## Phase

Phase 2: Local Merge to Main

## Related Spec

[spec.md](./spec.md) | [plan.md](./plan.md) | [tasks.md](./tasks.md)

## Epic 2 Context

From [MIGRATION-ROADMAP.md](http://MIGRATION-ROADMAP.md) Phase 2C:

> Delete ALL existing tests (packages/\*/tests/unit/, integration/, contract/)
> Rationale: Tests written for monolithic architecture, not target plugin architecture

## Phase

Phase 2: Force-Push to Remote

## Related Spec

[spec.md](./spec.md) | [plan.md](./plan.md) | [tasks.md](./tasks.md)

## Commands

```bash
git push origin main --force-with-lease  # DESTRUCTIVE - verify previous tasks complete
```

## Safety Notes

* Verify all previous tasks completed successfully
* Team notification sent (T004)
* Branch protection disabled (T005)
* Baseline tag created (T014)

title: T014 [US1]: Create annotated baseline tag
description:
## Task Details

Create annotated git tag `v0.1.0-baseline` as rollback point.

## User Story

US1: Clean Git History Establishment (Priority: P1)

## Phase

Phase 2: Baseline Tag Creation

## Related Spec

[spec.md](./spec.md) | [plan.md](./plan.md) | [tasks.md](./tasks.md)

## Commands

```bash
git tag -a v0.1.0-baseline -m "Baseline before Epic 2-7 migration

Commit: $(git rev-parse HEAD)
Date: $(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)
Purpose: Rollback point for Epic 1 force-push

This tag marks the repository state after:
- Merging infra-modernization-full to main
- Migrating docs/new/ to hierarchical structure
- Creating baseline documentation

Next step: Force-push to establish clean history"
```

description:

US2: Documentation Structure Modernization (Priority: P2)

[spec.md](./spec.md) | [plan.md](./plan.md) | [tasks.md](./tasks.md)

## Commands

```bash
sed -i '' 's|docs/new/|docs/|g' README.md
sed -i '' 's|docs/new/|docs/|g' CLAUDE.md
find .claude/rules -name "*.md" -exec sed -i '' 's|docs/new/|docs/|g' {} +
```

title: T010 [US1]: Merge infra-modernization-full to main with no-ff
description:
## Task Details

Merge infra-modernization-full to main using --no-ff to preserve history.

## User Story

US1: Clean Git History Establishment (Priority: P1)

## Phase

Phase 2: Local Merge to Main

## Related Spec

[spec.md](./spec.md) | [plan.md](./plan.md) | [tasks.md](./tasks.md)

## Commands

```bash
git merge infra-modernization-full --no-ff -m "Merge infra-modernization-full to main

Epic 1: Repository Stabilization & Git Cleanup
- Consolidates diverged development branch to main
- Establishes baseline for Epic 2-7 migration work
- See docs/plan/MIGRATION-ROADMAP.md for full context"
```
